long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tab switcher with keyboard shortcuts

Press and release 
(Alt/Option + Shift )
to switch to previous active tab

Hold 
(Alt/Option + Shift)
to open tab switcher and arrow keys to navigate to a tab and release to switch to it

After installing, click on extension icon and Scan Tabs to scan all existing tabs.

If you have more than 10 tabs open, this is for you. Switch tabs easily and visually

No ads
No tracking
No payment
